divs: Sighting Detailswas out in the backyard with my wife when she noticed a reddish orange object to the southwest traveling at approximately the same rate of speed as a small aircraft, in between sporadic fireworks we did not detect any sound or noticed any flashing flight lights, object then appeared to hover for about 10 seconds then turned and began moving to the east and appeared to gain altitude and move at a very high rate of speed until it vanished behind my neighbors house approx. 50 deg.s above horizon.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: red orange orb in flight west to northeast, hovered, started flight upwards and east at high rate of speed
